name: 『I HAVE ONLY ONE MINUTE? ❥ CONFESSION TIME!!!』:･ﾟ✧:･ﾟ
name_original: 『I HAVE ONLY ONE MINUTE? ❥ CONFESSION TIME!!!』:･ﾟ✧:･ﾟ
description:
trigger warning: mentions of bullying and selfharm

Ai! Love! Confession time! ~✧
Everything's going to go well, right? Your friend taught you all the tips and tricks on love, so no doubts about it!

In this game, you confess and get rejected (lol). But maybe finding some clues in the classroom will help you unlock new conversation options. Rinse and repeat until you reach the ending!

(Guys, our game is still "little" raw, but we would be really grateful to see your reviews/rating despite it. Hope you have some great time solving our puzzles and confessing to a "dream girl". )

Controls:
WASD for movement
Hold LMB to drag objects
Ctrl to crouch
ESC open menu

[The game was made for Mini Jam 114: Anime²]
